text: is the only child of Emperor Naruhito and Empress Masako of Japan. == Early life == Aiko was born on 1 December 2001 at Imperial Household Agency Hospital in Tokyo Imperial Palace. She studied at Gakushūin for her elementary and high school years, and now studies at Gakushūin University. Title 1 December 2001 Her Imperial Highness Princess Aiko (imperial title) Princess Toshi National Honors Japan -Grand Cordon of the Order of the Precious Crown (5 December 2021) ==References== ==Other websites== * Their Imperial Highnesses Crown Prince Naruhito and Crown Princess Masako at the Imperial Household Agency website * Press Conference by Their Imperial Highness The Crown Prince and Crown Princess After the Birth of Her Imperial Highness Princess Aiko * Press Conference on the occasion of the First Birthday of Her Imperial Highness Princess Aiko (2002) (Written Answers) * BBC News | Japan's new princess meets the public Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese princes and princesses Category:People from Tokyo
title: Aiko, Princess Toshi
